20101223070810.000|20101223070812.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IN THE FOOTHILLS,  
20101223070812.000|20101223070814.000|CC1|THE FLOODING WAS EVEN WORSE.    
20101223070814.000|20101223070816.000|CC1|THOSE THAT LIVE HERE HAVE COME  
20101223070816.000|20101223070817.000|CC1|TO EXPECT IT.                   
20101223070817.000|20101223070819.000|CC1|ALTHOUGH, NOT AS MUCH AS BROUGHT
20101223070819.000|20101223070820.000|CC1|BY THIS WEEK-LONG SERIES OF     
20101223070820.000|20101223070821.000|CC1|STORMS.
